enable.name: Enable Rainbow Icon
enable.description: Enable or disable the rainbow effect on your icons.

editorEnable.name: Enable Rainbow Icon in Editor
editorEnable.description: Enable or disable the rainbow effect on your icons in the editor.

shortcut.name: Rainbow Shortcut
shortcut.description: Enable or disable shortcut button on the pause menu

sync.name: Sync Rainbow
sync.description: Enable or disable the sync rainbow effect between the color1 and color2.

glow.name: Rainbow Glow
glow.description: Enable or disable the glow effect on the rainbow.

particle.name: Rainbow Particle
particle.description: Enable or disable the particle effect on the rainbow.

wave.name: Rainbow Wave Trail
wave.description: Enable or disable the wave effect on the rainbow.

offset_color_p1.name: Rainbow Offset Color Player 1
offset_color_p1.description: The color of the offset effect on the rainbow for player 1.

offset_color_p2.name: Rainbow Offset Color Player 2
offset_color_p2.description: The color of the offset effect on the rainbow for player 2.

offset_color_particle.name: Rainbow Offset Color Particle
offset_color_particle.description: The color of the offset effect on the rainbow for the particle.

bar.name: Rainbow Bar
bar.description: Enable or disable the bar effect on the rainbow.

preset.name: Rainbow Preset
preset.description: 0 = Only Glow(if enabled), 1 = All enabled, 2 = Only the color1 rainbow effect, 3 = Only the color2 rainbow effect

playerPreset.name: Rainbow Player Preset
playerPreset.description: 1 = Both player 1 and are rainbow, 2 = Only player 1 is rainbow, 3 = Only player 2 is rainbow

superSpeed.name: Rainbow Super Speed
superSpeed.description: Enable or disable the super speed of the rainbow effect.

speed.name: Rainbow Speed
speed.description: The speed of the rainbow effect (1 is the slowest, 10 is the fastest).

saturation.name: Rainbow Saturation
saturation.description: The saturation of the rainbow effect (0 is the lowest, 100 is the highest).

brightness.name: Rainbow Brightness
brightness.description: The brightness of the rainbow effect (0 is the lowest, 100 is the highest).
